title: Add convenience members to SKPoint/SKSize/SKRect
body:
Some cool members might be:
- [x] center of a rectangle (ie: `rect.MidX`)
- [x] ~~percent of a size (ie: `size * 0.5f` or `size / 2f`)~~
- [x] ~~scaling rectangles (ie: `rect * 2`)~~
- [x] fit a rect inside another rect (ie `rect.Fit(anotherRect, fitStyle: shrink/grow/shrinkOrGrow)`)

Leave comments to share what you might think useful, and I will see if I can add them.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I added some methods to SKRect:
- `Standardized` (return a rect that has the left < right and top < bottom)
- `AspectFit(Size)` and `AspectFill(Size)` to fit/fill a size inside a rect

Scaling is a bit harder, as a single value cannot show if it is going to be the width/height or actually the whole rect. `Inflate()` is probably good enough.

It might also be better to create separate issues for each new member (track progress)
